attributes.action: Expain how he will compenste those taxpayers who earn less than 18000 per annum and so are hit by the removal of the 10 p basi rate but will not benefit from extra tax credits. winter fuel payments or the minimum wage?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not everyone who will pay more tax because of the abolition of the 10p rate will qualify for the extra "benefits" now proposed as compensation.  We are the minority I suppose, the ones who keep going to work, struggling with higher mortgage payments,food, energy and petrol prices.  WE NEED HELP TOO. Many of us are public workers that face yet another real cut in our living standards.

rejection.details: It is better to ask for direct action that involves changes in policy, such as "compensate...", rather than for explanations.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
